title: 2212 Two Seater Sofa Italian Leather/Black
body: Together with the 2213 Three Seater Sofa, Borge Mogensen designed 2212 Two Seater Sofa for their home in entofte, north of Copenhagen with the help of his wife Alice. The collection still stands their up to this date. The design is perfectly proportioned to ensure maximum comfort, with just the right height arm and backrest. Offering impeccable quality and attention to detail, this loveseat is sure to impress even the most selective.
